boardgame.name: Tao Long: La Strada del Dragone
Tao Long: La Via del Dragone
Tao Long: O Caminho do Dragão
Tao Long: The Way of the Dragon
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;There was something formless and perfect before the Universe was born. For lack of a better name, I call it the Tao._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;Lao Tsu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tao Long: The Way of the Dragon is a circular abstract-like game in which each action taken leaves different options for your foe. In it, each player controls a dragon striving to diminish the other whilst bound together by the Tao; you manipulate tokens on a special board in order to activate your dragon, leaving that same board to be manipulated by your opponent on their turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Among customizable scenarios and increasingly profound modes, both dragons will move, attack, block each other's way and seek dominance. At the end, there can be only one... that is, at least until the tides of change come once again._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2017 Golden Geek Best 2-Player Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: 26 Devon Dice podcast season 2 Sub Terra, sub DOOM and sub monsters
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Tao Long: The Way of the Dragon – 4 Players Expansion
Tao Long: The Way of the Dragon – The Four Seasons
Tao Long: The Way of the Dragon – The Pink Fluffy Bunny
Tao Long: The Way of the Dragon – The Tiger and the Phoenix

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Pre-order : Estimated delivery Jul 2017 Tao Long Golden Bundle For a true Tao Long Enthusiast! This Bundle includes every item in the deluxe edition in a limited black box, plus a Tao Long print, the limited Golden Flux Metal Token, the limited Golden Portals and all add-ons available and to be unlocked during the campaign. (200€ value) Includes: Tao Long Deluxe Edition 4 Player Expansion Deluxe Edition Tao Long Cotton Bag Tao Long Cardboard Board KS Exclusive Metal Flux Coin Limited Edition Golden Metal Flux Coin Limited edition Foil Golden Portals All unlocked Stretch Goals Any other add-on unlocked during the campaign Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC ( prefer IBAN with Europa) Any questions just ask.

***KS edition*** Tao Long Deluxe Edition KS Exclusive Metal Flux Coin 4 Player Expansion Deluxe Edition All unlocked Stretch Goals Flat shipping fee $12 for Continental USA. Combined shipping available. Also available for pick up in NYC (zip code: 10016). I accept Paypal, Venmo, Google wallet and Chase Quickpay. Price is negotiable if you buy multiple games. For international shipping, UPS/USPS/Fedex rate is usually about $30~$100 depending on distance. I can also ship with other options upon request.

This is the Kickstarter Exclusive Tao Long Deluxe Edition. This means -Wooden game pieces instead of cardboard -Magnetic box lid -Game mat instead of game board -Kickstarter Exclusive metal flux coin -Kickstarter Exclusive pink fluffy bunny -Kickstarter Exclusive tiger and phoenix

New in shrinkwrap. Kickstarter deluxe edition. Includes the playmat, the Tiger and the Phoenix and all game pieces in thick wood compared to the retail edition. New in shrinkwrap. Kickstarter deluxe edition. Includes the playmat, the Tiger and the Phoenix and all game pieces in thick wood compared to the retail edition. KS deluxe edition - has a sleeve with a mountain scene over the red magnetic box. Map is made of mousepad material. All board pieces are made out of wood. Includes 4-player Expansion, Tiger _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Phoenix expansion, Fluffy Expansion, and 4 Seasons Expansion. Comes with two metal yin/yang coins (possibly a mistake?). Played maybe 10-15 times, but everything in like new condition since it is made of sturdy wood. Instruction manual may be less crisp than a new one, but it is undamaged. Buyer pays shipping from 92010, which likely means $12+ to west coast and $20+ to east coast.
